job_tasks.phrase: deliver services & libraries that add value to our Search as a Service platform.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of building and providing software components (services and libraries) that enhance an existing platform, which is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be part of a mature, cross-functional team that is responsible for the end-to-end delivery of these services, which includes design, security, development, testing and deployment of services & back-end components.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence outlines the full software development lifecycle responsibilities, from design to deployment, for services and back-end components, fitting the definition of traditional software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: The project is focused on the delivery of services within the search domain with a service architecture that utilizes Solr, query parsing, dictionaries, cloud platforms, and 3rd party technologies in its delivery.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of services within a specific domain (search) using a service architecture and various technologies, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Write, test, review, document service-oriented applications in collaboration with onshore and offshore developers, mostly for the development of PoC's.
job_tasks.justification: This directly lists core software engineering activities: writing, testing, reviewing, and documenting applications, especially in a collaborative environment for Proofs of Concept (PoCs).

job_tasks.phrase: Identify potential opportunities for code optimization.
job_tasks.justification: Code optimization is a standard software engineering task focused on improving the performance and efficiency of existing code.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide input for code reviews and help with environment build deployments, release notes and build notices.
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews and assisting with build deployments are essential parts of the software development and release process.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintain code sanity and promote & practise coding standards/practices within the team.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring code quality and adherence to standards is a fundamental software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Document application design and logic
job_tasks.justification: Documentation of application design and logic is a key part of the software development process.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, identify and recommend operational improvements resulting in improved reliability and/or efficiencies in maintaining the application.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on improving the operational aspects and maintenance of an application, which is part of the software engineering lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools required to meet our current and future needs across WK
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to the architecture, assets, and tools for an application's needs is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: help with environment build deployments
job_tasks.justification: Assisting with environment build deployments falls under the operational aspects of software delivery, akin to DevOps practices.

job_tasks.phrase: use AWS services
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning the use of cloud services like AWS is a technical skill related to the infrastructure supporting applications and potentially data management.

job_tasks.phrase: learn about the latest technologies in the domain of search technology
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need to understand and potentially work with technologies related to data and its application in search.

job_tasks.phrase: utilize & learn AWS technologies
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states the use and learning of cloud technologies, which are often involved in data handling and application deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team members and QA engineers to drive deeper integration of NLP, machine learning and AI technologies to enhance uptake & delivery of components.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the integration of AI/ML technologies (NLP, machine learning, AI) into components, indicating a role that works with these technologies, even if the primary focus is integration rather than core model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and advise on technical aspects of open work requests in the product backlog with the project lead.
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating technical aspects of work requests, especially when AI/ML is involved, can touch upon model selection or integration considerations.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuously stay current on market trends and new technologies that can affect how we approach our solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This relates to understanding the data and technology landscape relevant to the solutions being built.

job_tasks.phrase: You will report into the lead software engineer and work hand in hand with business, product leaders, customers, and developers.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to collaborate and communicate with various stakeholders, including business and product leaders.

job_tasks.phrase: As a member of an agile team, we are looking for motivated and vocal individuals to collaborate and help build the best practices for the development team
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly calls for collaboration and being vocal within an agile team to establish best practices.

job_tasks.phrase: if lacking knowledge in one of the languages, we can provide training/resources to help learn either Java or Python.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a willingness to train and develop skills, suggesting a need for learning and adaptability.

job_tasks.phrase: learn about technologies in the content domain, use AWS services, and learn from a mature development team.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states opportunities and expectations for learning new technologies and from experienced team members.

job_tasks.phrase: learn about the latest technologies in the domain of search technology, utilize & learn AWS technologies
job_tasks.justification: Reinforces the expectation of learning new technologies, specifically in search and cloud services.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools required to meet our current and future needs across WK
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to driving architecture and tools implies taking ownership and potentially innovating on how solutions are built.

soft_skills.phrase: work hand in hand with business, product leaders, customers, and developers.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates a need for close collaboration and communication with various stakeholders.

soft_skills.phrase: As a member of an agile team, we are looking for motivated and vocal individuals to collaborate and help build the best practices for the development team
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration and being vocal within a team, which are key communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: if lacking knowledge in one of the languages, we can provide training/resources to help learn either Java or Python.
soft_skills.justification: The offer of training implies an expectation and value placed on learning new skills.

soft_skills.phrase: learn about technologies in the content domain, use AWS services, and learn from a mature development team.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights an opportunity and expectation for learning new technologies and from experienced colleagues.

soft_skills.phrase: learn about the latest technologies in the domain of search technology, utilize & learn AWS technologies
soft_skills.justification: Reinforces the emphasis on continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies.

soft_skills.phrase: Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools required to meet our current and future needs across WK
soft_skills.justification: Driving architecture and tools suggests taking initiative and ownership of the technical direction.

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on traditional software engineering tasks (1.A.1), such as designing, developing, testing, and deploying services and back-end components. While it mentions the integration of AI, NLP, and machine learning technologies, these are described as enhancements to existing components rather than the core focus of model development or GenAI specialization. The role requires working with existing platforms and integrating these AI capabilities, fitting the description of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer who builds software that uses AI/ML as a core feature.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is quite clear about the core software engineering responsibilities. The mention of AI/ML integration is present but not the primary driver of the role. The confidence is high, but not perfect (5), as the depth of AI/ML involvement is not extensively detailed, leaving a slight ambiguity on how deeply the AI aspects are integrated beyond 'enhancement'.
